price: 18. Están sordos, mudos y ciegos (ante la verdad) y no podrán regresar (al buen camino).
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
